Our Passion

Since conception, Chocolate Fashion has been an initiator in the concept of chocolate gifting ideas, catering to a wide range of occasions. But most importantly, a much-needed outlet that combines our love for two things in one. Art and Chocolate

What we do

Our specialty is originality. Whatever the occasion is, we strive to deliver unique ideas that are tailored to the particular taste of our clients

Our Journey

Chocolate fashion started as a home run business in Beirut, Lebanon back in 2014 as a partnership between Wiam Nasr and Fady Al Sabbagh, Co-founders.
Seven years in, hundreds of events planned and executed successfully. Over a thousand happy clients who took advantage of our rich experience, high-end delivery of chocolate designs and displays, as well as our superb pre and post sale customer service
